meanings.definition: Engaged in an activity or occupation for pay on a part-time basis.
meanings.sent1: She is a semipro photographer, taking pictures at events on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The team consists of semipro players who have other jobs during the week.
meanings.sent3: The semipro chef only cooks for special occasions, like birthdays and holidays.
meanings.sent4: His semipro status in gardening means he tends to his plants with professional care.
meanings.sent5: Being a semipro musician allows her to perform at local venues while still working full-time.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in an activity or occupation for pay on a part-time basis.
meanings.sent1: The semipro in the band plays the drums during weekend gigs.
meanings.sent2: As a semipro, she tutors students in math after her regular job.
meanings.sent3: The semipro painter only sells his artwork at local fairs and markets.
meanings.sent4: He's a semipro in fishing, always catching big fish in his free time.
meanings.sent5: The semipro writer pens short stories for magazines on the side of his main job.
